name: Your Gallery
description:
Do you ever think that your pictures are a work of art? Well you know what, they are! (And I'm not saying that because art is subjective, I really mean it!) This game/thing will generate a gallery that you can explore, based on your pictures!

Download, unzip and run Your Gallery.exe. If Windows Defender SmartScreen pops up, click More Info and Run Anyway.

If you get stuck on how to use it, I made a video up there.

The way this works is it will grab all pictures from the selected folder, and all of the folders that are inside that main folder. Folders within folders within folders will be ignored! (It's not folders all the way down).

I made a development log of the process, it's not very good as it's my first time but if anyone was interested in the process: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Bq4sxzBS5VoeRMP0_b0slJBrd35JdLbA0QJn0L3yxmQ/...
